label: No runaway in shape/size fields
chi_eff_usage: Indirect: Re(T) = 7.086 emerges from Higgs mass constraint
note: Gate 59: Racetrack potential minimized via scipy.optimize. v22.0-12PAIR: Re(T) = 7.086 derived from Higgs mass constraint (m_h = 125.1 GeV). The 12x(2,0) bridge system provides additional moduli stabilization through cross-shadow flux. Vacuum stable with bounce action B > 400. The racetrack parameters (A, B, a, b) are calibrated from chi_eff = 72 per shadow. No runaway in shape/size fields
